about_the_game:
Lust Vessel follows the story of Kate as she goes on a space cruise for her vacation with her best friend, after getting drunk she wakes up alone some days later to find out that everyone has lost themselves to passion. Now Kate need to find out happened on the days that she was drunk, what happened to her best friend, meet interesting characters, find out more about her and her body and maybe solve this problem.

Features

Losing a battle isn't the end of the game! Kate has scenes with all the enemies.
Depending on Kate’s lust level, different options will open or close
Over 70 base scenes
15 different endings
Different routes for the game, each with different enemies
Every character can be romanced and has at least two endings

Disclaimer
All characters involved in any sexual act in Lust Vessel are over 18 years old.

highlighted.name: I can solve this on my own

content_descriptors.notes: The game has sex scenes involving every character of the game, all characters are over 18

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: 2+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Not an integrated video card; Latest drivers; OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: 3+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Not an integrated video card; Latest drivers; OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: 2+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: 3+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Lust Vessel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Not an integrated video card; DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 3+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Not an integrated video card; DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Lust Vessel follows the story of Kate, she took a space cruise for her vacation but after getting drunk she woke up without memories of the last couple days, as she leaves her room she finds out that everyone has lost themselves to passion, now she has to find out what is happening.
